events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position, including a detailed resume and portfolio.
The application has been categorised under Engineering based on the candidate's experience in software development and devops.
Recruiter John Smith has been assigned to manage the recruitment process for this software engineer candidate.
An initial screening call was conducted to assess the candidate’s basic programming skills and familiarity with devops practices.
The candidate responded promptly expressing strong interest in the role and availability for the next steps.
A technical interview has been scheduled for 2024-05-07 14:00 UTC to evaluate the candidate’s software engineering abilities.
The technical interview was successfully completed with positive feedback on the candidate’s problem-solving and coding skills.
An HR interview has been scheduled for 2024-05-09 11:00 UTC to discuss company culture fit and benefits.
The HR interview was completed and the candidate showed strong alignment with company values and expectations.
We have proposed a competitive offer to the candidate for the software engineer role including salary and benefits.
The candidate provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining the engineering team.
The candidate formally accepted the offer, confirming their start date and eagerness to begin contributing as a software engineer.
Onboarding activities have commenced, including account setups, access to development tooling, and team introductions.
The recruitment process for the software engineer has been successfully closed with the candidate fully onboarded and integrated.
